key.name: autolatex-cmd
key.description: This is the absolute path to the binary 'autolatex'.

key.name: autolatex-backend-cmd
key.description: This is the absolute path to the binary 'autolatex-backend'.

key.name: force-synctex
key.description: Indicates if SyncTeX must be used, even if the configuration files are set to not use it.

key.name: show-progress-info
key.summary: Enable or disable the progress info
key.description: Indicates a progress info should be displayed when long-time operations are processing.

key.name: save-before-run-autolatex
key.summary: Save the document before running AutoLaTeX
key.description: Indicates if the documents should be saved before launching AutoLaTeX
